task.Task: Prepare a botanical extract for chromatographic analysis by removing extraction solvents without degrading thermally sensitive compounds.
Develop a stable microencapsulated formulation of a volatile fragrance compound for controlled release in consumer products.
Isolate plant-derived alkaloids from a crude extract for pharmacological screening and potential therapeutic applications.
Study the catalytic hydrogenation of benzene to cyclohexane using different stirring rates to optimize selectivity and conversion efficiency.
Concentrate a dilute pharmaceutical intermediate solution to facilitate subsequent crystallization steps with minimal thermal degradation.
Obtain pharmaceutical-grade pseudoephedrine from a complex mixture for research purposes requiring analytical standards.

Recover and recycle organic solvents from pharmaceutical process waste streams for environmental compliance and cost reduction.
Remove water from an azeotropic reaction mixture to drive the equilibrium toward product formation with minimal energy input.

task.Task: Examine the efficiency of ammonia decomposition to produce hydrogen gas under varying pressure conditions for clean energy applications.
